changeLog.details:
Version 1.0.4 of dcl-edit is now available. To update, just run npm i dcl-edit -g

This release of dcl-edit features support for the Custom Component Markup. You can write your own components for dcl-edit now. Take a look at the documentation: https://dcl-edit.com/custom-component-markup/

What's Changed

New features:

Add Custom Component Markup
	When parenting entities, the transform of the child entity stays the same in world space.
	Translate on plane handles are now always on the camera facing side of the gizmo.

Bug fixes:

Context Menu now scales with UI Scaling setting. For example, when right-clicking in the hierarchy, the menu that pops up will scale properly with the UI Scaling setting in the Settings menu.
When the edge of the scene view was clicked to resize the panel, the currently selected entity might have been deselected.
